name: Island Game
description:
This is the first game I have ever published and my first game jam submission. It was made for the Ludum Dare 45 game jam. Source code is available at https://github.com/e1019/LDJam45

WASD to walk, Space for action. Cut down trees, rocks and build bridges using the action button. There's also supposed to be XBOX controller support (left thumbstick and A button), however this is untested on the browser.
